message: This is a low-quality product, but I'm willing to let it go for $100. It's a great opportunity to get a deal on a product that normally wouldn't be worth much. If you're interested, I can offer you a 30-day money-back guarantee, but I'm not sure how much you'll like it.

Thank you for the offer, but I'll pass on this one. I appreciate the discount and the money-back guarantee, but given the low-quality nature of the product, I think it's best if someone else gets the chance to benefit from it.

I understand your decision last time, but I want to assure you that this product is in even better condition than the previous one. It's still a low-quality product, but I've taken extra care to make sure it's in a good state. I'm willing to let it go for $100, and I'll throw in a free accessory that complements the product. This way, you'll get a bit more value out of it. If you're still not interested, I'll keep looking for a buyer.

I appreciate the effort you've put into this product, but I still feel it's best if I pass on this opportunity. The additional accessory doesn't change the fact that the core product is low-quality. I'll look for other options that might be more suitable for me.
